ios.info.plist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This allows us to know which city is in the moment when you first open the app, initially showing the events in this city, and your current location will allow you to search for events near you and calculate routes. If you do not want to allow access to your location you can add cities manually.
ios.info.plist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This allows us to know which city is in the moment when you first open the app, initially showing the events in this city, and your current location will allow you to search for events near you and calculate routes. If you do not want to allow access to your location you can add cities manually.
